channel.title: Character editor ::char
channel.description:
Whenever I try either the make-over mage or the ::char command the screen comes up, but if you change anything it will crash and the client will get this error: [code] Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.NullPointerException at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method476(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:1253) at client.method75(client.java:6434) at client.method105(client.java:9796) at client.method112(client.java:10522) at client.method146(client.java:14021) at client.method102(client.java:9253) at client.method9(client.java:10446) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:127) at client.run(client.java:5383) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Anybody know the cause?

Find out if your client/server supports the Character change interface…

java.lang.NullPointerException
Something along the way is defined as null.

Whenever I try either the make-over mage or the ::char command the screen comes up, but if you change anything it will crash and the client will get this error:

Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method476(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:1253)
